targets.expr:
label_replace(
  label_replace(
    label_replace(
        sum by (ic_subnet, instance) (adapter_cryptocsp_crypto_lock_acquisition_duration_seconds_count{ic=~"$ic",ic_subnet=~"$ic_subnet",access="read",name="public_key_store",instance=~"$instance",instance=~"($instance_host):[0-9]+"}),
          "ic_subnet", "$1", "ic_subnet", "([^-]+)-.*"),
  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"),
  "le", "Inf", "le", "\\+Inf"
)

  "instance", "$1:...:$2", "instance", "(\\[(?:[^:]+[.:]){4}).*(:[^:]+\\]?):[0-9]+"),
  "le", "Inf", "le", "\\+Inf"
)
